name: Maniac SEO
author: Webmaster Alessandro Peruch

sections.description:
Easily optimize your WordPress Website with one plugin for more efficient SEO results, it is the most complete SEO plugin available for WordPress. It offers everything you need to optimize your site. Tool: Backlink Checker, keyword suggest, Keywords density, Keyword Position, Social URL Analytics, Page Rank Checker, Plagiarism Checker, SEO Analyzer,…
Maniac SEO tool check web site, blog is everyday use, handy tool for webmaster, bloger and SEO expert.

Free Maniac SEO Analyzer tools website but easy to use, just enter your website in the given box; you will get a report in English. This free tool allows you to get important information on the content of your web page: title tag, description tag, word density, Links, images…

The plugin SEO Manic send your requests to the site www.web-master.guru that works and returns the results in your plugin.

The plugin has access to the service free www.web-master.guru/seo.html, if you want full access to the service that provides the data in CSV format and precious advice to improve your SEO, you need to register at a cost of Euro 100 , 00 single site.

Through AJAX Jquery not sent password or data privacy, only the data that you provided in your demands.

The upgarde not add any more to function in your plugin, you only have more data.

To your requests we are not added nor images neither text

The plug-in local (127.0.0.1 / localhost) does not work completely
More info: WordPress SEO.

Further Reading

For more info, check out the following articles:

  • The Maniac SEO.
  • Free SEO tools online.
  • Free SEO Analyzer.

Tags

seo, SEM, Maniac SEO, google, meta, meta description, search engine optimization, yahoo, bing, WordPress SEO, multisite, keywords, meta keywords, description, webmaster tools, google webmaster tools, seo pack, backlink, checker, backlink checker, keyword suggest, keywords density, keyword position, social url, social, social url analytics, page rank, page rank checker, plagiarism checker, seo analyzer.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-maniac-seo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Maniac SEO through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Auto-configure
sections.faq: You’ll find the FAQ on www.web-master.guru.
sections.changelog:
• First release.
  • It is okay Worpress 4.3

2.0

  • fixed bug analyzerSEO.
